name: Moon Muncher: Lunar Looting
description:
Move and jump with WAD or the arrow keys.

You have 10 seconds to reach the end of each level. More often than not, you can't, so you need to help yourself with powerups! Place them down with [Space] (or teleport back to the starting position with [T], leaving them where you last stood).

There was supposed to be a moon and munching involved as the title suggests, but procrastination happened.

There's no audio. v_v

The web version fails to save progress!

Fonts:

  • https://www.fontspace.com/old-english-gothic-pixel-font-f83405 - title
  • https://www.fontspace.com/super-legend-boy-font-f34010 - everything else

Software: Godot, Aseprite, Krita

Art by me(mewore) and @rabbitpet2
